xuiMenu
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for menu control. It allows the ability to display a menu with links, actions, and options. Its items can be separated by dividers, and groups of items can have their own header.

Usage

as element:
<xui-menu
       title="{string}"
       size="{string}"
       display-style="{string}"
       is-disabled="{boolean}"
       items-source="{string}"
       menu-align="{string}"
       icon="{string}"
       [menu-append-to-body="{boolean}"]>
</xui-menu>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
titlestring

Value to be shown as menu button text.

sizestring

Size of menu. Values: 'normal' or 'small'.

(default: 'normal')

display-stylestring

Style used for menu button. Values: 'tertiary' or 'secondary'.

(default: 'tertiary')

is-disabledboolean

Expression to determine if menu should be disabled.

items-sourcestring

Value to be used as menu items data.

menu-alignstring

Alignment used for menu list. Values: 'left' or 'right'.

(default: 'left')

iconstring

CSS class for the menu item.

menu-append-to-body
(optional)
boolean

Appends the menu to '$body' instead of the parent element.

Example
